casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Mark Steven PATTON. No. 578P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 24, 2008. Kathleen U. Baldwin, Assistant Attorney General, James C. Gaither, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of December 2007 by Defendant to Proceed as Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of January 2008."
